resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2777</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A guessing Game</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein schätzendes Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu d'estimation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo supondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco d'ipotesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι εικασίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un juego que conjetura</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An activity where the students express themselves orally in English as part of a guessing game. Includes teacher intsructions and an assessment rubric. Intende to reinforce vocabulary</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Aktivität, wo die Kursteilnehmer sich 
mündlich auf englisch als Teil eines schätzenden Spiels ausdrücken.
Enthält Lehrer intsructions und eine Einschätzung Rubrik. 
Intende, zum des Wortschatzes zu verstärken</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité où les étudiants s'expriment 
oralement en anglais en tant qu'élément d'un jeu d'estimation. 
Inclut des intsructions de professeur et une rubrique 
d'évaluation. Intende pour renforcer le vocabulaire</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade onde os estudantes se expressam 
oral em inglês como a parte de um jogo supondo. Inclui 
intsructions do professor e um rubric da avaliação. Intende 
para reforçar o vocabulário</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività dove gli allievi si esprimono 
oralmente in inglese come componente di un gioco d'ipotesi. 
Include i intsructions dell'insegnante e una rubrica di 
valutazione. Intende per rinforzare vocabolario</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι σπουδαστές εκφράζονται 
προφορικά στα αγγλικά ως τμήμα ενός παιχνιδιού εικασίας. 
Περιλαμβάνει τα intsructions δασκάλων και μια ρουμπρίκα 
αξιολόγησης. Intende για να ενισχύσει το λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad donde los estudiantes se expresan 
oral en inglés como parte de un juego que conjetura. Incluye 
intsructions del profesor y una rúbrica del gravamen. Intende 
para reforzar vocabulario</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
